data.subject: Can I transfer GrabPay Credits to other passengers
data.body: As a sender, you can send GrabPay Credits to a receiver by scanning payee's QR code that is located inside Grab app.

data.subject: Compete Risk Free with $100,000 in Virtual Cash
data.body: We pride ourselves on welcoming all to take on our 26.2 mile challenge, from some of the world’s greatest elite runners, to those who thought completing a marathon would never be possible. Many regular runners find this the ideal event to get a personal best time, whilst everybody finds the incredible Mancunian support throughout the course unforgettable.  16,000 people of all abilities will be at the 2019 event on Sunday 7 April.

data.subject: Emirates Old Trafford, Lancashire County Cricket Club,
data.body: There are toilets, changing facilities and supervised bag storage plus on site parking, music and entertainment, retailers and catering. Every finisher receives a t-shirt, medal and a goody bag.

data.subject: Bring every family into your classroom
data.body: Teachers can encourage students for any skill or value — whether it's working hard, being kind, helping others or something else

data.subject: Premier League done deals: Every completed signing in the 2019 summer transfer window
data.body: Ex-Man United midfielder Ander Hererra has claimed he 'likes being hated' after his switch to French champions Paris Saint Germain. The Spaniard left Manchester United on a free transfer this summer after the club reportedly refused to meet his £350k-a-week wage demands.

data.subject: Transfer news and football gossip: Liverpool plan late signing, Man United agree huge Mandzukic deal, Pogba to Real Madrid off
data.body: talkSPORT.com rounds up all the latest transfer news and football gossip from Monday’s papers and online… 3 Manchester United have rejected a ‘derisory’ offer from Real Madrid

data.subject: Arsenal have been handed a boost in their pursuit of Kieran Tierney with Celtic reportedly set to sign Brentford’s Rico Henry.
data.body: The Gunners have been locked in transfer talks with the Hoops over the 22-year-old for several weeks.

data.subject: Following Harry Maguire’s £80m move to Man United, Leicester are now working hard on finding his replacement.
data.body: We have been told the King Power outfit would like to offer a part exchange deal involving winger Rachid Ghezzall, who's struggled for form and game time since joining from Monaco last summer.
